name: vivim-monorepo
description: VIVIM Monorepo - PWA, Server, Network Engine, and Admin Panel

scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k "bun run dev:pwa" "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:network:ws" "bun run dev:admin"
scripts.dev:network:ws: cd network && HOST=0.0.0.0 bun run dev:ws
scripts.dev:server:debug: cd server && LOG_LEVEL=debug bun run dev
scripts.dev:network:debug: cd network && LOG_LEVEL=debug bun run dev
scripts.setup: bun run setup:deps && bun run setup:db
scripts.setup:deps: bun install && cd pwa && bun install && cd ../server && bun install && cd ../network && bun install && cd ../admin-panel && bun install && cd ..
scripts.setup:db: cd server && bun run db:generate && bun run db:migrate
scripts.start: concurrently "cd pwa && bun run preview" "cd server && bun run start" "cd network && bun run start"
scripts.build: cd pwa && bun run build && cd ../server && bun run build && cd ../network && bun run build
scripts.test: cd pwa && bun run test & cd server && bun run test & cd network && bun run test

author: VIVIM Team
